column5: The clients I had out today got a treat and limited out on some beauti Simcoe Lakers. We ended up getting most of the fish approx. 9.5km N.W. of Jackson's pt in 73ft of water. Blue Fox Vibrotail jigs, Williams spoons and Meegs account for the action.... we limited out before noon and moved into the Whitie grounds. Working the jigs aggressively on the bottom then moving them up while shakin seemed to be key today....most of the stikes were agressive and a good time had by all.  http://profishntanglingservices.com/MyPict...100_0025-50.jpg  P.S. .... Watch the slush out there..... very bad in some places.   Take care and Good Fish'n.... Greg.
great report greg, looks like you were really on them... again!!!
Awesome fish - those smiles say it all.
Greg,another great outting for you and your clients.Conrats  Steve
Very Nice Greg.  What a day for sure  Congrats.  Joey
great going and as usual a fantastic report greg   i havn't even been out yet on the ice but just maybe have to get out before the end of it
Greg, great report once again, I'm glad my bad vibes didn't stick with you. I just hope the next time out with you the fish be more co-operative with us!  Stan
great day on the water gregg,they are some real nice lakers thats for sure.  ...keep up the great work,you sure know how to find them.....right -on....cheers
